briefTitle: Methylphenidate Transdermal System (MTS) in the Treatment of Adult ADHD

outcomeMeasures.title: Wender Reimherr Adult Attention Deficit Disorder Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: This scale measures the 7 domains of the Utah Criteria for Adult ADHD. Total scores run from 0 to 28. Normative samples average below 5. The worst possible score is 28.

outcomeMeasures.title: Conners' Adult ADHD Rating Scales (CAARS)
outcomeMeasures.description: Measures the DSM based ADHD criteria of Inattention and Hyperactivity/Impulsivity. There are 30 items scored 0-3 for a minimum score of 0 (no symptoms) and a maximum score of 90 worst possible symptoms.
